required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Extrapulmonary Presentation of COVID-19 Patients During the Second Wave

brief_summary.textblock: An observational study about the extrapulmonary presentations of COVID-19 patients during the second wave of the pandemic.

detailed_description.textblock:
a prospective observational study that aimed at
1. provide an overview about the prevalence of extra-pulmonary presentation of COVID-19 during the second wave of the pandemic and
2. Detection of the most frequent affected systems with comparison between the pulmonary and extrapulmonary presentation of COVID 19 as regard patient demographics, comorbidity and level of care needed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline presentation of confirmed cases with COVID-19
primary_outcome.description: frequency of extrapulmonary presentation inCOVID-19 second wave pandemic

arm_group.description: patients with confirmed covid 19 disease who primarily presented with extrapulmonary system affection
patients with confirmed covid 19 disease who primarily presented with pulmonary disease

study_pop.textblock: patients presented at a triage point in a tertiary health care facility with a suspected covid 19 disease.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- all patient with confirmed covid 19 disease presented to our health facility during the second wave of the pandemic
Exclusion Criteria:
- other diagnosis than covid 19 as a primary cause of presentation of the patient

reference.citation: Dong E, Du H, Gardner L. An interactive web-based dashboard to track COVID-19 in real time. Lancet Infect Dis. 2020 May;20(5):533-534. doi: 10.1016/S1473-3099(20)30120-1. Epub 2020 Feb 19. Erratum in: Lancet Infect Dis. 2020 Sep;20(9):e215.

Clinical features of patients infected with 2019 novel coronavirus in Wuhan, China. Lancet. 2020 Feb 15;395(10223):497-506. doi: 10.1016/S0140-6736(20)30183-5. Epub 2020 Jan 24.
